channel.title: Music on Bruno Leme
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Bruno Leme

item.title: Project 4: Dimension Reduction and Clustering on Facebook Friends and their Music Page Likes.
item.description: This is an old project that I recently replicated in Python. This study is focused on my Facebook friends data, collected through Facebook Graph API. I collected my list of friends and the list of music pages each of them liked. I treated the json data to structure the data in a matrix format with shape n X m, where n is the number of user friends and m is the number of music pages.
